segments.text: I see the girl is just standing there, waiting for her brother to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so innocent and trusting, it's quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice she's not trying to climb up herself, she's being patient.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she must really look up to her brother, following his lead.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy, on the other hand, is being quite adventurous, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit envious of their bond, they seem to work well together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what kind of cookies they're after, they must be their favorite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost taste the sweetness, it's making my mouth water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman is still drying dishes, not paying attention to the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she should join them, make it a family activity instead.
segments.speaker: PAR
